pages.text: Apart from their golden wings, the $(thing)Phygs$$() of the $(thing$()Aether$() aren't all that different to regular $(thing)Pigs$(). They too can be saddled and ridden, though will follow your lead without needing a Carrot on a Stick. The wings allow them to almost fly, leaping high into the air, then gliding slowly down.$(br2)Killing a $(thing)Phyg$() grants 1 $(thing)Cutting$() experience. They can be led, and bred using $(item)Blue Berries$().
